profile.name: Somnath Ghosh
profile.title: Engineering Manager | Certified SAFe 6.0 Scrum Master
profile.bio: Seasoned Software Engineering Manager with 10+ years of experience in the IT industry. Skilled in orchestrating business initiatives and projects, identifying customer and operational requirements, crafting strategic plans, and overcoming performance impediments. Adept at building and leading high-performing engineering teams from scratch, driving infrastructure modernization, and delivering measurable business impact. Expert in cloud architecture (AWS/GCP), microservices, and fostering collaborative engineering cultures. Passionate about AI integration and platform transformation.

description: Leading the Alexander Street Back-Office team managing 8+ applications under ProQuest for content automation, metadata management, CDN operations, and video processing.
